DOC.HEADLINE: GLOBAL MARKETS AND ECONOMIC UPDATE : INTERNATIONAL BUSINESS
DOC.TEXT: MEXICAN STOCKS * The market fell slightly Wednesday ahead of today ' s inauguration of President-elect Ernesto Zedillo , as some investors registered disappointment with Zedillo ' s Cabinet appointments . The Bolsa index fell 4.82 points to 2 # 591.34. * Traders said the market would have slumped more sharply if not for the fact that the state development bank Nafinsa stepped_in to buy . On government orders , Nafinsa was apparently trying to offset selling triggered by Zedillo ' s failure to include popular Finance_Minister Pedro Aspe Armella in the new Cabinet . The Bolsa dropped as low as 2 # 570 early in the session . Source : Times wire_services SPOTLIGHT : JORDAN The economy has recovered from the impact of the 1991 Persian_Gulf_War . But unemployment is still almost 25 % and the nation has a heavy debt load . The Jordanian government is betting that the peace_treaty signed with Israel in October will bring much-needed foreign_aid and investment . Sources : Bank of America ; World Information Services
